channel.title: [HELP]Need Help Adding Potions[HELP]
channel.description: Okay so I know this is a kind of noob thing to ask but, I can't seem to find a decent way to add potions to my allstarscape source. I have a way in my head of doing it but I just don't like it. I googled around and searched on other forums and can't find a solution. Please post a link to a tutorial or just post an answer below. Thank you.

item.title: [HELP]Need Help Adding Potions[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

No it didnt work. i think I’m just going to have to jury rig it.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP]Need Help Adding Potions[HELP]

item.description:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I personally never coded or even looked at allstarScape. The code above probably won’t be compatible with your source, but if you have some experience with coding in your source and know you way around along with some simple understanding of Java. You could edit to work on your source.
